short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export your YouTube playlists into Excel (.xlsx) with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Exportron is a simple Chrome extension that allows you to download your YouTube playlists with just a single click.

After installation, simply click the export button under any playlist you want to export. Exportron will generate a neatly organized Excel (.xlsx) file containing detailed information about your YouTube videos, including Title, URL, and Date when video was added to the playlist.

If you have any issues or suggestions, please feel free to contact us via email provided bellow.
